translations: v．折磨，使痛苦：给予身体或精神上的痛苦。
· The disease afflicts thousands of people every year.
这种疾病每年使成千上万的人受苦。

phrs.translation: 折磨, 使痛苦, 深受其苦
多情最累, 鬼迷心窍

sentences.sentence: But fear of public speaking, which everyone must do from time to time, afflicts one-third of the population.
sentences.translation: 三分之一的人都有演讲恐惧症，但这是每个人都时不时要做的事情。
不稳定性折磨整个国家。

sentences.sentence: The same worry afflicts supporters of unpopular causes.
sentences.translation: 同样的担忧也困扰着其他不那么热门的运动的支持者们。
